location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Shaikh Mohumed

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has two different foliation sequences. The first is part of an original foliation sequence which was applied to the whole volume. It is written in ink and appears at the top left corner of the page. The second foliation number is a small pencil number enclosed in a circle which also appears in the top right corner of the recto, this is the foliation number that has been used in referencing this item.Condition: The item has suffered from insect damage and is difficult to read in places as parts of the text are missing.

mods.abstract: The letter relates to the matter of Arrathoon Malcolm and a payment to his nephew. Stannus comments on the unfriendly conduct and violence taken by the Shaikh against Malcolm and his family, and advises him the matter will be referred to a higher authority.
